name: I Hate Colors
summary:
I Hate Colors
The Pixel-blob hates all colors other than White.
Go on an endless mission to gobble all the colors that come in the way of the hungry angry Pixel-blob.
Its not easy to catch all of them, the mission gets tougher and puzzlingly awesome as you keep playing.
Enjoy a brain rattler anytime when you want a break.
Go Get It..!
